messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Reading porn was new to this list: Hi!
messages.msgSnippet: ... doors ... A couple years ago I posted that when you were interviewed in HEM, I read it out loud to my husband when we were on a date. And I do fold HEM
messages.messageBody:
>I've been told before that my articles had been stuck on refrigerator
doors
>and tapes had been left in husbands' car stereos, but I've never been
>informed that anyone was reading my stuff in the bathroom.

A couple years ago I posted that when you were interviewed in HEM, I read
it out loud to my husband when we were on a date.

And I do fold HEM open to key articles and sometimes underline stuff and
leave it in the bathroom. But, I think he enjoys it and it can lead to
good discussions.

Extremism in defense of unschooling is no vice! ;-)

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Reading porn was new to this list: Hi!
messages.msgSnippet: Perhaps she misunderstood the nature of Lisa s article which was left for reading by some (nice, I m sure) man with his pants down.    :-) I ve been told
messages.messageBody:
Perhaps she misunderstood the nature of Lisa's article which was left for
reading by some (nice, I'm sure) man with his pants down. :-)

I've been told before that my articles had been stuck on refrigerator doors
and tapes had been left in husbands' car stereos, but I've never been
informed that anyone was reading my stuff in the bathroom. (Not that it
might not happen...)


Sandra


http://expage.com/radicalunschooling
